servinfo.title: Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Drain cooling system referring to Cooling System Description:For Diesel Engine Model .
Remove ECT sensor (1) from thermostat assembly by removing clip (2).

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection:For Diesel Engine Model

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal procedure for installation noting the following.

item.ptxt: Check ECT sensor O-ring for damage.
If malfunction is found, replace ECT sensor.
Refill cooling system referring to Cooling System Refilling:For Diesel Engine Model .
Check cooling system leakage referring to Engine Cooling System Inspection and Cleaning:For Diesel Engine Model .
